verses.name: Genesis 20:12
verses.text: And yet indeed she is my sister; she is the daughter of my father, but not the daughter of my mother; and she became my wife.

verses.name: Genesis 20:13
verses.text: And it came to pass, when God caused me to wander from my father’s house, that I said unto her, This is thy kindness which thou shalt shew unto me; at every place whither we shall come, say of me, He is my brother.

verses.name: Genesis 20:14
verses.text: And Abimelech took sheep, and oxen, and menservants, and womenservants, and gave them unto Abraham, and restored him Sarah his wife.
